name: Anamnesis (itch) (GavinStewart01)
description:
A 2D narrative-driven adventure game set on board a deep space research vessel. Will you face your memories and defeat your monsters, or be consumed by regret?

Developed by Stone Monkey, Anamnesis follows the player character, Henry, as he struggles to break free from a time loop on board a dark spaceship. You must collect all your memories, unravel the mysterious break in time, and conquer the monsters which lurk in the shadows, or forever be trapped by your regrets in space...

This game features gorgeous art, an intimate narrative, strong voice acting and an intriguing mystery for the player to solve. Developed using Unity for a third-year professional project at Abertay University.

StoneMonkey Team Bio

Gavin Stewart - Team lead/Producer & Sound Designer

Finn Simpson - Narrative Designer & Sound Designer

Brodie Flynn - UI/UX Designer & Level Designer

Gabriel Tierney - Gameplay & Tools Programmer

Stylianos Zachariou - Gameplay & Tools Programmer

Craig Wilson - Environment & Character Artist

Zacharie Rayne - Monster Artist & Animator

Thank you to our academic tutor Mona Bozdog and our clients

Manos Agianniotakis and Prakash Choraria for their guidance and support


Fact Sheet
